item.title: Why Did RAPT Stock Surge 63% In Pre-Market Today?
item.description: GSK will acquire RAPT for $58.00 per share in cash, a 65.2% premium over Friday’s closing price of $35.1.

item.title: Why Is MSTR Stock Falling In Pre-Market Today?
item.description: Bitcoin-proxy Strategy (MSTR) slipped in premarket trade despite a Louisiana pension fund revealing a new $3.2 million stake.

item.title: Why Is NVDA Stock Down 3% In Premarket Today?
item.description: Shares are under pressure amid heightened geopolitical risk tied to the evolving U.S.–Greenland situation.

item.title: Ethereum Co-Founder ‘Not Unhappy’ As JPMorgan, AmEx And Big Tech Build On The Network
item.description: Ethereum signals that institutional L2 adoption is accelerating as banks build tokenization rails.
